body_text: I tested that the timer works the way I want by fiddling the pref. I also tested that uninstalling the add-on didn't cause any weird errors, including when the timer would have fired. I haven't tested that there aren't unexpected changes to other times, but I'd expect that to be out of scope of Normandy's test cases.
